◆ IsExpired() [2/2]

bool Game::CGoal::IsExpired ( bool  force_end)

См. определение в файле Goal.cpp строка 953

954 {
955  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
956  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
957  Obj::CSkater* p_skater;
958 
959  p_skater = skate_mod->GetLocalSkater();
960  if ( p_skater == NULL )
961  {
962  return true;
963  }
964 
965  Obj::CSkaterEndRunComponent* p_skater_endrun_component = GetSkaterEndRunComponentFromObject(p_skater);
966  Dbg_Assert(p_skater_endrun_component);
967 
968  // If no players are left, the goal should expire
969  if ( gamenet_man->GetNumPlayers() == 0 )
970  {
971  return true;
972  }
973 
974  // If it's an unlimited game, don't expire the goal
975  if ( m_unlimitedTime )
976  {
977  return false;
978  }
979 
980  // check if the skaters have reached end of run BEFORE
981  // setting the exception, or you'll never catch it!
982  bool expired = false;
983 
984  switch ( m_endRunType )
985  {
986  case vENDOFRUN:
987  expired = p_skater_endrun_component->RunHasEnded();
988  break;
989  case vGOALENDOFRUN:
990  expired = p_skater_endrun_component->GoalRunHasEnded();
991  break;
992  case vNONE:
993  // if we're not supposed to use end of run, we need only check
994  // the time
995  return ( (int)m_timeLeft <= 0 );
996  break;
997  default:
998  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
999  }
1000 
1001  if ( expired && (int)m_timeLeft <= 0 )
1002  {
1003  // Dbg_Printf( "**** Already Expired\n" );
1004  return true;
1005  }
1006 
1007  // if time is up, set the end of run exception
1008  if ( (int)m_timeLeft <= 0 )
1009  {
1010  // Dbg_Printf( "EXPIRING GOAL: %d\n", GetGoalId());
1011  // printf("&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&& calling EndRun\n");
1012  switch ( m_endRunType )
1013  {
1014  case vENDOFRUN:
1015  m_endRunCalled = true;
1016  // Dbg_Printf( "**** Calling End Run\n" );
1017  p_skater_endrun_component->EndRun( force_end );
1018  break;
1019  case vGOALENDOFRUN:
1020  // printf("reached goalendofrun\n");
1021  m_endRunCalled = true;
1022  p_skater_endrun_component->EndGoalRun( force_end );
1023  break;
1024  default:
1025  Dbg_Assert( 0 );
1026  }
1027  }
1028 
1029  // printf("AtEndOfRun returned %i\n", all_expired);
1030  // return ( all_expired && ( (int)m_timeLeft <= 0 ) );
1031  return false;
1032 }
